title: MAJOR PING 8-10 PM: THIRD THREAD
body:
This my third thread now without a response, posted over two weeks.

I get terrible ping from 8 to 10 pm.

it instantly spikes to 70 and above and remains that way until around 10 o clock.

The hextech repair tool says it is 20 like it should be.

Someone help.

replies.body:
Oh hey, I replied to [one of your last posts](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ay54u80h-lag) about this. I'm sorry to hear this is still an issue for you. 

Awful latency (ping) during specific hours is usually a direct result of your ISP rerouting traffic to League during specific hours to mitigate network congestion. Before we take an in-depth look at your network routing, I'd first like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change to your latency.
